name: Escape from fall guys
description:
The astronaut named Boris, got was kidnapped from Among Us and brought to Fall guys as fall guy, guys got angry that among us stole their spotlight. He finally escaped the pedestal prison and now has to navigate through the level to reach a communication tower where he will be able to call his friends for from using his tablet.

Boris has to navigate through the level while not hitting any obstacle or falling in any ravine/hole. If the player trips or falls, his laptop is going to drop, breaking it slowly. If the tablet drops more than a certain amount of times, the table will break completely, and you lose the game
